author: Walter Cronkite
message: I can't imagine a person becoming a success who doesn't give this game of life everything hes got.
title: Thought of the day

author: Socrates
message: The greatest way to live with honor in this world is to be what we pretend to be.
title: Thought of the day

author: Seneca
message: The conditions of conquest are always easy. We have but to toil awhile, endure awhile, believe always, and never turn back.
title: Thought of the day

author: Chalmers
message: The grand essentials of happiness are: something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
title: Thought of the day
